channel.title: Posts on Biostatistics
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Biostatistics

item.title: Interactive workshops
item.description: Workshop series with interactive content for learning modern data science and statistics tools. We regularly create and share new content. Stay posted. Tidyverse series Tidyverse is a collection of useful R packages for data science tasks. We’ve found them to be helpful, so we created and hosted a workshop series based on them. Visualize It’s hard to compete with ggplot2 when creating static visuals in R. Check out this interactive tutorial by following the link: Learn ggplot2.

item.title: Shiny applications
item.description: Shiny is an applications framework written in R for creating interactive user interfaces. Members of the Department have created Shiny apps to make complex statistical procedures more accessible. Complete listing of Department Shiny applications snSMART Sample Size App Small n Sequential, Multiple Assignment, Randomized Trial (snSMART) is a two-stage clinical trial design for rare diseases. Use the app. iBAG suite Coming soon.
